content: Drop down toward the lava and go left into the ice-covered portion of the room. Open the chest on the right to collect Celestial Ribbon and a Mind Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cave Depths'.
The content is as follows:
Drop down toward the lava and go left into the ice-covered portion of the room. Open the chest on the right to collect Celestial Ribbon and a Mind Core.
